channel.title: Stuck in valve/override water tunnel
channel.description:
status: bm_c1a1c at: -3460 x, -2439 y, -1047 z getpos: -3460.422607 -2439.635986 -1047.968750;setang 3.553920 -17.307953 0.000000
Don't think it requires a screenshot tbh, it's where you go into the water tunnels, turn the valve, float up and climb out of a second shaft. There's something wrong with the ladder and I couldn't climb out. Restarted the game and it was OK, but only managed it after a couple of minutes trying.
There was a barrel in the shaft the first time and not the second, which could be a coincidence, or not.
